group_1.textCenter: It's time to begin "The Endless Chilled@Pasta Battle"!
We're going to enjoy this, Manaka-sensei!
These three teams will be facing each other@today!
I'm Manaka Kurumi, your announcer. With me@today is our commentator...

group_1.textRight: Hello, I am Meiyui Chun. My friends made me@come here because I wasn't doing anything.

group_1.textLeft: We shall be your hosts!
Go, Yachiyo!
I wonder how much they actually have to@eat?

group_1.textRight: I checked online a few minutes ago...
On average, women eat around 50 bowls of soba@in one sitting at an all-you-can-eat place.

group_1.textLeft: That's per person?

group_1.textRight: Yeah, but it depends on the person.

group_1.textLeft: About that, Meiyui, do you have any thoughts@on this event being a team competition?

group_1.textRight: Eep! Were they listening to us?

group_1.textLeft: I see! So that's what will set the winning@team apart from the others!
Wow, what an exciting new competition!

group_1.textRight: Didn't you come up with it yourself? It@sounds like you're bragging...

group_1.textLeft: ...Okay! The event is about to start!
Let's start the countdown!
Begin!
Here we go!
The first ones to eat are:@Tsuruno Yui of Team Nanami!
Hazuki Yusa of Team Shizumi!@And Akira Shinobu of Team Tokiwa!
Each contestant is eating so fast!

group_1.narration: The competition was relay-style, with@Tsuruno going first on Yachiyo's team. Then@Felicia would go, with Yachiyo at the end.
Konoha's team would be@Hazuki, Ayame, then Konoha.@And Nanaka's team was@Akira, Nanaka, and then Kako.

group_1.textLeft: *Burp* I can't eat anymore... I have a ways@to go before I'm the mightiest...

group_1.textCenter: Ugh, no more. I can't. Your turn, Ayame.

group_1.textLeft: Ooof! I'm stuffed! Hehehe!

group_1.narration: Konoha's team was leading, with 60 plates.@Yachiyo's team was second, with 50 plates.@Nanaka's team was close behind at 45 plates.

group_1.textLeft: Thank you for the food...
Haaaaaah!
What's this?! Yachiyo is piling up her@plates at an alarming rate!
How is Konoha responding?
She's savoring every bite!

group_1.textRight: She forgot this is a competition...

group_1.textLeft: What the heck are ya doin'?!
Yachiyo is in the lead with over 70@finished plates!
Nanaka's steadily caught up to Konoha,@and just passed her!

group_1.narration: Yachiyo pulled ahead and got nearly 100 @plates, more individually than anyone else!

group_1.textLeft: Whew...
Uh oh! Yachiyo's fork has started to slow@down!
After eating so much of it...I'm getting a@little tired of this dish.
Yachiyo and Nanaka look like they're@getting full!

group_1.textRight: One contestant is still taking her time...

group_1.textLeft: Now it's time...
For the Special Flavor Change Chance!
It's a bonus, as we enter the last leg of@the competition!
Contestants are allowed to choose a@sauce for a different flavor!
By changing the taste, we're changing the@outcome of the contest! ...I think!
But contestants may only choose one type@of sauce!
Will you use this flavor change chance?

group_1.textRight: They still have Kako on their team. Maybe@"slow and steady" is their strategy.

group_1.textLeft: Yachiyo has asked for a flavor change!
What sauce will it be?!

group_2.textLeft: Did you hear that, folks?! Yachiyo chose@mayonnaise!
How will this affect the contest?!

group_3.textRight: I'd like a bit more kick! I'm choosing@hot sauce!

group_3.textLeft: This will spice up her food AND the contest!

group_4.textRight: ...Vinegar! I'm placing all my bets on@vinegar!

group_4.textLeft: Yachiyo picked the least popular choice,@vinegar!
Will it give her a fighting edge?!
